info.author: Hakan Çelik
info.description:
## Getting started

Install the package:

```python
pip install koinim
pip install koinim -U
```

## How to use koinim

Let's include each class in our project, as below.

```python
from koinim import Ltc, Btc

# Ltc
sell = Ltc().sell
buy = Ltc().buy
ltc_to_try = Ltc().ltc_to_try(ltc_amount:float)
try_to_ltc = Ltc().try_to_ltc(try_amount:float)
bids = [bids.__dict__ for bids in Ltc().OrderBook().bids()]
asks = [asks.__dict__ for asks in Ltc().OrderBook().asks()]

# Btc
sell = Btc().sell
buy = Btc().buy
btc_to_try = Btc().btc_to_try(btc_amount:float)
try_to_btc = Btc().try_to_btc(try_amount:float)
bids = [bids.__dict__ for bids in Btc().OrderBook().bids()]
asks = [asks.__dict__ for asks in Btc().OrderBook().asks()]
```
info.name: koinim
info.html_description:
## Getting started

Install the package:

```python
pip install koinim
pip install koinim -U
```

## How to use koinim

Let's include each class in our project, as below.

```python

# Ltc
sell = Ltc().sell
buy = Ltc().buy
ltc_to_try = Ltc().ltc_to_try(ltc_amount:float)
try_to_ltc = Ltc().try_to_ltc(try_amount:float)
bids = [bids.__dict__ for bids in Ltc().OrderBook().bids()]
asks = [asks.__dict__ for asks in Ltc().OrderBook().asks()]

# Btc
sell = Btc().sell
buy = Btc().buy
btc_to_try = Btc().btc_to_try(btc_amount:float)
try_to_btc = Btc().try_to_btc(try_amount:float)
bids = [bids.__dict__ for bids in Btc().OrderBook().bids()]
asks = [asks.__dict__ for asks in Btc().OrderBook().asks()]
```
